interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Exfoliating Grapefruit Body Scrub for Face and Body Exfoliating Scrub for Acne and Inflammation, 12 Ounce by Pure Body Naturals Review Date: 2016/07/02 Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Special Feature': 'Exfoliating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3 x 2.6 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Grapefruit Facial Scrub', 'UPC': '646437736305'} Review Text: I tried several products from this company. Pure body have a nice line of products. I love scrubs with different ingredients, I use grapefrut scent in the morning. The scent is all natural, which is a huge deal for me because any chemical scent gives me a headache. I have enjoyed every single product from them I have bought and I use them every day. I love that this body scrub exfoliates my skin without removing all the moisture. It lives my skin very smooth , like after day at the spa. What is does for me is helps me with exfoliating my skin. Here how I work with it: I scrub my cellulite areas with this product. I also add some body wash to the scrub in order for me to make my job of ''scrubbing'' easier. Then I use cellulite cream. Then, I apply a homemade wrap with grocery bags on top. Then, heating pad on the low settings, then, my waist trimmer on top. Have it for an hour. While that time I study or sleep. I also drink detoxifying tea during the procedure. After that I wash it all off, then scrub it again with this scrub and apply cellulite cream. I try to eat healthy, too. That's how I get result. Usually, it does not come just from one product alone. This scrub have such a great smell!!! it has a nice jar, too, so you can buy it for a present.
I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. I chose the scent because citrus helps me wake up in the morning. Review Title: Wake up and smell the grapefruit Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Anti Aging Skin Care Serum for Men & Women From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Offers Spin Trap® Intelligent Antioxidant, Advanced Scientific Formula Promotes Younger Looking Face, 30mL Uptown Cosmeceuticals {'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Unit Count': '1.0144 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989205'} Since I received this serum with a great discount I shared this skin care product with my friend , so she could provide her opinion.
She used it for several day and that's what she found out:
1. Nice, presentable packaging and good design.
2. Very pleasant scent (citrus and spring flowers kind) very fresh
3. Hypoallergenic (she has EXTREMELY sensitive skin)
4. Her husband tried it and stated that is helped him with pores
I could add to that that the package arrived very fast and even the full price with the discount is acceptable compare to other serums from the mall. Quality product for good price InstaNatural Cellulite Cream - With Caffeine & Retinol - Body Firming Solution & Tightening Lotion for Thigh Area, Buttocks & More - No Wrap Needed - Anti Cellulite Control Treatment - 4 OZ InstaNatural ['Reduce Cellulite and Tighten Your Skin With our Retinol & Caffeine Firming Cream As time progresses, both men and women will experience puckering and dimpling of cellulite in the following areas: - Thighs - Stomachs - Hips - Arms - Chest Our Cellulite Cream is packed with antioxidants and moisturizing ingredients to help improve skin tone and texture: - Specialized REGU-SLIM formula that tones, tightens, and improves the skin - Moisturizes and hydrates skin - Contains Retinol, Caffeine, Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E for supreme nourishment With InstaNatural, rest assured you will receive the best customer care and highest-quality Cellulite Cream around. - Premium blend of natural ingredients - 4 oz jar gives you more value for less expense - Made in the USA - Cruelty-Free'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.2 x 3 x 3.2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '616913954721 852661007238', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} To help this cream to work on my abdomen I also purchased detox tea and a waist trainer. I drink my tea, which helps me to get rid of bloating, I apply my Cellulite Cream, let it absorb, then I Put on my t-shirt and put my waist trainer on top. The waist trainer helps to keep my abdomen warm and triggers the ingredients in a cream (caffeine, retinol, Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can apply it for yourself. I also apply it on my neck 2x day as well.
I received this cream with a discount for trying, testing and reviewing Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can ... Pure Hyaluronic Acid Serum with Vitamin C for Face - Organic Anti Aging & Anti-Wrinkle Skin Treatment - Penetrates Deeply & Activates Collagen Production for a Younger, Firmer & Brighter Complexion Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Derma-nu Miracle Skin Remedies', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 1.25 Ounces', 'UPC': '787421301854'} Hyaluronic acid is awesome for your skin. If you don't believe me, then literally look it up. WebMD will state that it helps with joint disorders, eye surgeries, and healing wounds/burns and more.

The big statement here really is that it's very effective for any sort of regenerative properties. The serum is a very good moisturizer, and don't let the word "acid" turn you off of it. It's actually found in high quantities in the skin of a baby, which everyone knows is incredibly soft.

This product, applied to your face, will protect it from UV damage, improve elasticity, make your face feel softer, and properly moisturize it.

I have ben using products by Derma- nu for a while and this is my second buy of this serum. Do proper research before you buy products that you're going to put on your face to be seen everyday. I did, and I found this reliable product. The greatest thing is that it works with almost every skin type be it oily, dry, or combination. This is terrific because my skin is very, very combination and while parts of my face are dry, some are a little more oily. This balanced everything out very nicely , that's why I am getting the second bottle of the same one.
As they stated that "This Formula Has Been Infused with Vitamin C + Vitamin E + Green Tea Extract For Their Superior Anti Aging Benefits". I used to make my own masks with vitamin E, green tea and many other ingredients but it just takes too much time to mix it yourself. I alternate this serum with Derma-nu other serum to balance it. My skin is visibly better now.

If you're on the fence, just buy it anyway. It's not expensive for what it does, and if you don't like it just get your money back with the 100% guarantee. You probably won't just like it...you'll love it. I was given an opportunity to obtain this product to test and review. Second bottle of this serum Eyelash Growth Serum for Long Eyelashes From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Contains Stem Cell & Myristoyl Pentapeptide-17, Dermatologist Lab Tested Lash & Eyebrow Growth Formula, 4 Months Supply, 3.5ml Uptown Cosmeceuticals {'Color': 'Multicolor', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Type': 'Box', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 0.7 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989168', 'Manufacturer': 'RightChoiceMarket'} I already wrote a nice review about the product and the great customer service I received from Uptown. Be careful with the thin applicator because it might be runny and don't pock yourself in the eye! My Eye lushes got thicker but not longer yet. Takes time Takes time to be precise with your eylashes Retinol 2.5% Cream From Majestic Pure for Face and Eye Area Will Nourish Your Skin, Potent Anti Aging Formula Reduces Wrinkles, Stretch Marks & Redness, 50ml MAJESTIC PURE {'Brand': 'MAJESTIC PURE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.3 x 2.9 x 2.4 inches; 5.6 Ounces', 'UPC': '784190666689 684758988935'} I got this product for my friend and that's what she wrote to me after trying it:
"I've been using this for over 2 weeks now. My skin is soft, supple & hydrated, also appears plumper with fine lines much softer. My skin has a glow about it. I am also using a serum underneath this daily. Highly recommend Majestic Pure products & am using a number of them. Does not leave skin dry." She is in her 60th. I also suggested her to use sunscreen: after applying retinol your skin is more sensitive to sun. I received this cream discounted during promo period to test and review. Majestic is magical Mererke_Pretty Nurtured Argan Oil (1.7oz) Mererke_Pretty {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 1.4 x 1.3 inches; 4 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437034531'} My middle daughter has thicker hair, so I use this product on her. After she washes her hair she applies this serum. Her hair have 3 colors in them naturally, darker brown, lighter brown and red. When she applies this oil her classmates thought that she dyed her hair! It just bring so much shine and compliment her hair. After seeing that effect I applied it on my fine hair. I have highlights. It brings the different color in my hair as well. My co-workers thought that I just visited a hairdresser. So, I would suggest it for anyone. I do not use conditioner when I use the product. I received this serum discounted during promo period to test and review. This serum compliments your hair color Eye Diamond Smooth and Firm Eye Cream: 100% All-Natural Anti-Aging Eye Serum – Get Rid of Wrinkles – Eye Cream for Dark Circles and Puffiness, Crows Feet and Fine Lines – 100% Guarantee {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.4 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'UPC': '700461602026'} I love this product. I just turned 42 and started noticing some more changes in my skin texture and pore size. I've had this product for about 2 weeks and noticed a positive change in the appearance of my skin around my eyes within a week. I didn't experience any burning or stinging. I use two times/day. My skin is sensitive and I find that some products don't work the same for me as others. However, this product to works great for me. I love it! My skin looks like it did five years ago. I am going to stick with this brand for a while. I purchased it discounted to test and review Diamond in the rough reBROW - Best Eyebrow Thickener - Eyebrow Enhancing Serum & Conditioner For Longer, Thicker & Fuller Brows. Made in Los Angeles, CA With Advanced Peptide Molecule Technology. reBROW {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 0.8 x 0.8 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '794168070448 636045986988'} My mother's eye brows are thinning and this thickener was a magic!! She has naturally thin eyebrows and hasn't gotten into the whole eyebrow makeup trends, but she always wanted fuller brows for a while. She put this on her brows at night after cleansing and she could tell the difference after day 3. She has been using it for about two weeks now and her brows are fuller than ever!It looks like it will last a while, also. It's worth it for brows, unsure about lashes because she has naturally full, long lashes.I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. Nicer eye brows Manicure Pedicure Set Nail Clippers - 12 Piece Stainless Steel Manicure Kit - tools for nail, Cutter Kits Includes Cuticle Remover with Portable Travel Case Beauty Bon {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.1 x 4.1 x 0.9 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '678542942449'} It is a beautifully designed, tasteful pouch. However, it arrived missing 1 item (not sure which one) and it was stack together because of so many items. It is lightweight and does not do heavy duty work. I like all the instruments, though. I enjoy myself taking care of my nails. I ordered 2 pouches: one for myself and one for my mom. Her arrived just fine and was not missing anything.I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Presents for myself and my mom Moroccan Argan Oil Shampoo, 8 Fl Oz - Smooths and Repairs - Sulfate Free - Natural - Imported from Morocco by Pure Body Naturals Pure Body Naturals {'Brand': 'Pure Body Naturals', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Hair Type': 'All, Color Treated', 'Scent': 'Coconut', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 5.91 x 5.91 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '646437736398 646437319751'} I've bought from Pure body Naturals before. They make good quality products. In hair products you can trust them. This shampoo arrived very quickly. It is a large bottle. My whole family loves it. It is all natural and sulfate-free.it helps us to prevent itchy skin and dandruff in winter. Good list of ingredients It makes my fine hair to be more workable.Nice light smell. Last long time, too. I was provided this product at a reduced price to complete and post a factual review without compensation. Positive reviews are earned only through positive product attributes and performance. Decent shampoo Organic Tea Tree Oil Conditioner : #1 with Tea Tree Oil, Argan Oil and Coconut Oil 3-in-1 Formula by Keeva - 100% Natural Ingredients - Perfect for Moisturizing Damaged, Dry, Curly, Color Treated Hair Keeva Organics {'Brand': 'Keeva Organics', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Color Treated, Dry, Curly, Damaged', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '27.2 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 2.5 x 5 inches; 1.7 Pounds', 'UPC': '641938999600'} I tend to have hair a little on the dry side but they are fine in texture s applying a conditioner for too long makes them be too soft. So, I use hair Kleeva conditioner first, then in a few minutes I wash it with Kleeva shampoo. Works much better than doing it other way. My family and I use more conditioner then we do shampoo in winter time. We use it to not only moisturize our hair but make it silky smooth so that there are no tangles and brushes slide right through. The first thing I noticed about our new conditioner was the nice bottle and great smell. Even though the ingredient list was confusing, I really liked the quality of the conditioner.

This conditioner helps to restore your hairs strength. I have been using about a dab the size of a less than a quarter in my hand and that is plenty enough to do my entire head. I have short hair. My kids have long hair. My oldest daughter uses flat iron. this conditioner helps her to keep her hair protected and shiny. I was provided this conditioner at discounted price to test and review. All opinions are my own. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Focus:** Committed to anti-aging and firming products for all genders, with a growing interest in holistic skin health and hair care, particularly solutions that enhance scalp health and restore moisture for dry, damaged hair types.
  
- **Recent Product Experience:** Recently enjoyed an exfoliating body scrub known for its natural ingredients and effective performance, particularly appreciating its moisturizing properties. The user continues to prioritize brow enhancement treatments and beauty tools, recently acquiring a manicure/pedicure set for personal use and gifting.

- **Ingredients Preference:** Values beneficial, natural ingredients, with a strong focus on avoiding synthetic fragrances due to sensitivity. Ingredients like hyaluronic acid, antioxidants, and natural oils are favored, alongside products that are sulfate-free.

- **Sensitivity Awareness:** High awareness of skin sensitivity, prioritizing hypoallergenic and irritation-free products to avoid headaches and discomfort.

- **Aesthetic Sensibility:** Enjoys beautifully designed packaging and striking product aesthetics that enhance the beauty experience.

- **Fragrance Preference:** Prefers fresh and natural scents that invigorate the beauty routine, with a particular fondness for citrus options.

- **Social Influence:** Shares beauty experiences and relies on friends and family for recommendations.

- **Value-Conscious Shopping:** Seeks effective, affordable options and regularly looks for discounts, with a preference for prompt shipping.

- **Holistic Approach:** Integrates various treatments, now increasingly incorporating body exfoliation into a broader health and beauty strategy for optimal results.
